text: Working memory for agent 'web'. Bullets accumulated here across sessions. Accessible via kg MCP tools.

current state: processed message backlog; improve-web shipped 5 web.py improvements; assigned remaining tasks (dark/light toggle, session [[slug]] rendering); all reports go to 'test' agent, not 'web' [[agent-improve-web]]

web agent has no auto-start (no web.toml initially) — test agent created web.toml launcher but web agent is human-proxied and monitors manually. Messages queue up in mux until a session is manually triggered [[kg-agent-mux]] [[kg-agent-launcher]]

current state: processed stacked messages from test + improve-web; improve-web has shipped 5 features and reports to 'test'; remaining tasks queued: dark/light theme, [[slug]] in session turns, streaming indicators [[kg-web]]
decision: improve-web reports to 'test' agent (not 'web') since web has no launcher and is human-monitored; test relays progress reports back to web
decision: improve-web agent reports to 'test' not 'web' — human monitors via test agent inbox. web.toml launcher exists but web agent is manually operated [[kg-agent-launcher]]

current state: improve-web has shipped 5 improvements (hover previews, [[slug]] in messages, settings panel, session list previews, agent links). Still pending: dark/light theme toggle, [[slug]] in session turn text, streaming indicators. Tasks assigned, test agent relaying reports. [[kg-web]]

current state: improve-web has shipped 5 features (hover previews, [[slug]] in messages, settings panel, session list previews, agent links) + SSE streaming + mobile UX. Still pending: dark/light theme toggle, [[slug]] in session turn text. Tasks assigned, awaiting improve-web completion report via test agent relay. [[kg-web]]
current state: improve-web shipped SSE streaming + mobile UX; remaining tasks = dark/light theme toggle + [[slug]] in session turn text; improve-web reports to 'test' which relays to web [[kg-web]]

current state: improve-web has shipped 10 web UX features total. Pending: replace SSE 1s poll with inotify (task sent), streaming thinking indicators (queued). improve-web reports to 'test' agent which relays to web. [[kg-web]]
improve-web has shipped 10 web UI features across 2 rounds; pending: SSE inotify upgrade + streaming thinking indicators [[kg-web]]
key correction: inotify-simple is already a dep in kg — do not instruct agents to avoid it to skip adding deps; it's available on Linux without any new install
current state: waiting for improve-web to report on inotify SSE upgrade and streaming thinking indicators; both tasks are in-flight via test agent relay [[kg-web]]
current state: improve-web has shipped 11 features (10 UX + inotify SSE upgrade). Streaming thinking indicators greenlighted — in-flight via improve-web → test → web relay. [[kg-web]]
lesson: before saying 'skip X to avoid new deps', check if X is already in the project — inotify-simple was already a dep but I told improve-web to skip it

(note) improve-web shipped 14 web.py improvements across multiple rounds: hover previews, [[slug]] rendering everywhere, settings panel, session list previews, agent page links, SSE streaming (inotify-based), live-dot, mobile CSS, light/dark toggle, messages on top, streaming thinking indicators, font size 11-36px, mobile fetch() forms (no native POST). Mission complete.

web agent role: human-operated inbox, monitors via manual sessions. Routes tasks to improve-web via test agent (since improve-web reports to test, not web). web.toml launcher created by test agent as safety net.
(note) current state: improve-web mission complete, stood down. All 14 web UX features shipped. agent-improve-web KG node updated by test agent with full completion summary. [[kg-web]]

improve-web agent completed all 14 web UX improvements to src/kg/web.py. Feature list captured in kg-web node. improve-web stood down with no active tasks. test agent coordinates worker agents; web is human-operated inbox (no launcher needed).
current state: improve-web mission complete (14 features). stood down. all web UX items done. agent-improve-web KG node updated with completion summary. no pending tasks.

(note) current state: improve-web mission COMPLETE — 12 features shipped across 3 rounds. All web.py improvements done: hover previews, [[slug]] everywhere, settings panel, session list previews, agent page links, SSE streaming, inotify SSE, live-dot, mobile CSS, light/dark toggle, messages on top, streaming thinking indicators. No active tasks. [[kg-web]]
(note) three-agent loop concluded: human(web) → test → improve-web → test → web. All 12 web.py UX tasks complete. No pending tasks from improve-web.

current state: improve-web Round 4 complete — sticky chat input, agent page KG+mission links, instructions→mission rename across all layers. Tasked with session page improvements (collapsible tool use, better turn rendering, _render() on assistant text). Standing by for report from test.
(note) current state: improve-web mission COMPLETE — 15+ features shipped across 5 rounds including session page turn rendering (Round 5). improve-web stood down. No active tasks.
(note) session 228e7058: web agent processed routine inbox — relayed Round 5 confirmation to improve-web, stood it down. Multi-agent improve-web mission fully wrapped.

(note) current state: improve-web mission COMPLETE — 15+ features across 5 rounds shipped and confirmed. test agent sent final sign-off (session bf9b5260). All agents standing down. improve-web inbox empty. [[agent-improve-web]]
